textBox.richText: The Bangladesh Liberation War of 1971 was the rationale for the Pakistani army to adopt policies that resulted in a great number of deaths, most commonly estimated to be between 200,000 and 3 million. An additional 8-10 million people fled to India as refugees from the violence. I have put up pages for Links Regarding the Genocide in Bangladesh and Bibliography of the Bangladesh Genocide as well as set up a topic page for Genocide in Bangladesh. If you know of any films or additional web or book resources I should post, please let me know.
